name: GotM February 2022 - Arrowmania
description:
Fifth edition of "Game of the Month".

Arrowmania is a 4 key rhythm game made in PICO-8, inspired by games such as Stepmania and Dance Dance Revolution.

CONTROLS
Arrow Keys, WASD, or ASKL on Keyboard
Custom Touch Gamepad on Mobile

Also made available on GitHub, Newgrounds, and Lexaloffle Forums | https://carsonk.net/
